Text: #G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to know exactly what ALFRED does with my personal data, and share it only on my specific permission.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive information from ALFRED by speech technology.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use only well-visible buttons.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED as much as possible with speech interaction.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to always keep control on the activities of ALFRED.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to manage my privacy and data settings.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have everything preinstalled, so that I do not have to set up ALFRED by myself.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have a small ALFRED device that is wearable and easy to carry with me.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED on all my computers, tablets and phone.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED on a bracelet or a necklace, so that I can always wear him with me.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have clear instructions and service after sales that guide me if I have trouble in using ALFRED.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that speaks very slowly and clearly.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that only reacts to me.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that only listens to me when I ask it to.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to buy ALFRED in a senior shop with special client support.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to buy ALFRED for a low price.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive visual support, especially when looking at a list, map or agenda.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to pay for small amounts.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have a very good battery for ALFRED so I can keep him on the whole day.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that informs me about a low battery when leaving the house.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that can be easily adapted for user that have visual or hearing troubles.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that can be easily adapted for user that have visual troubles.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that can be easily adapted for user that have hearing trouble.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that repeats the last phrase.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to zoom into visual content.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that responds to the changing demand of the users by offering new Apps in the ALFREDO platform.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that helps me to communicate with my friends and family.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have video conversation with others.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have videophone.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an AFLRED device that encourages its users for real interaction between humans and not only with ICT tools.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that provides me with information about existing apps that corresponds to my interests.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to customize my preferences in the different functionalities of the solution.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have a simple ALFRED unit that is expandable in is functions.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have my data stored directly on the phone.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive a wake up call from ALFRED in the morning checking on me if I am ok.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive day and night rythm support with agenda reminders.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive support to use the public transport.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED for navigation.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED for touristic walks and indications with explanations on historical and cultural sights.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive support to have a taxi on time.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to see who is standing at my door and open the door.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to pick the phone sooner up when I am at home.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to turn on/off the lights.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to control the heating.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to control the TV and radio.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to watch movies.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to hear about the news.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to contact help in case of an emergency.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to use video calls in case of emergency.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED contact the nearest caregiver when I ask ALFRED for urgent help.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive a message when my home care nurse is on her way.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive a medicine reminder from ALFRED.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to see whether I already have taken my pills, so that I can avoid an overdose.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to be able to see if the patient has taken her medicine.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to do my grocery shopping.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to send messages.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to detect falls and send an emergency to a specific contact.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to suggest healthy recipes.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED ask spontaneous questions but it would be better to programme it during certain times of the day.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to initiate questions, but it should be in the domains of my interest such as cinema, exhibitions, cooking.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to call someone with ALFRED.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to activate the vocal interaction mode of ALFRED by pushing a specific button.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to maintain my contact list in my phone.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to manage my agenda.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to insert my meetings into ALFRED using speech.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive reminders on my appointments.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive a reminder from ALFRED on all the things I need to bring with me when I leave the house.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to set up social groups of people with similar diseases.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to contact people from my own circle.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to learn about art expositions or a museum.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to learn about all the social activities that are organized in my neighborhood.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to get a personalized invitation to a social event, so that it motivates more to go.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to navigate to an event or concert and help me when I am lost.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to help me navigate despite my mild cognitive impairments.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to pay for small amounts.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to organize a meeting with a group of friends at a certain place.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to play online games together with other users.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to get suggestions for sports classes in my neighbourhood.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to enable me to have face to face contacts as well, so that I do not just have virtual contacts over ALFRED.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to help me to control my body weight.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to just press one button to call my caregiver.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to decide who has access to my vital data.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to be sure that the user can decide who has access to her data.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have the wearables with integrated sensors to look good and not to be stigmatizing.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to see my vital parameters myself on the phone.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have the ALFRED shirt to look good.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have the ALFRED shirt has to be non stigmatizing.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's blood pressure.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's body temperature.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's heart rate.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's breathing frequency.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have feedback on the activity level of the user.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to locate the ALFRED user.
#G19# As a SocialCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to recognize pain and or stress by using skin conduction sensors.
#G19# As a SocialCaregiver, I want to have a step counter included into ALFRED.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to give me goals and missions that encourage me to do new activities and exercises and to go out.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to set limits in the games duration as I get bored easily.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to play games where I can use my Imagination.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to do guided exercises with ALFRED and ALFRED should also use sensors to capture health data while I am doing exercises.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have games that include my favourite sports.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive suggestions about local sport Classes.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to remind me to keep a good body posture.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to remind people to exercise regularly.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive specific tips how to reduce my health impairments without medication.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have some games that show me how good my memory and physical health is.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have training for specific muscle Groups.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to offer training for specific muscle groups.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to see my training Performance.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to help to motivate me during the week to do exercise that should change daily, as the constant change motivates me.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to propose me games that require the combination of mental and physical exercise, such as opposing motion exercises of the arms and legs.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to games that require the combination of mental and physical exercise, such as opposing motion exercises of the arms and legs.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to control if the user does the exercise correct.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have a regular summary on how much exercise is performed by the user.
#G19# As an InformalCaregiver, I want to have a game that the carer could play together with the user, so that it would enable to monitor the users' state of health but also have some fun time.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to propose training that promotes complex thinking.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to give corrective feedback if exercises are performed wrong, too much or in any other way harmful to the user.
#G19# As a developer, I want to present my app to as many people as Possible.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have the accounting to be as simple and clear as Possible.
#G19# As a developer, I want to easily create and to maintain my apps within the market place.
#G19# As a developer, I want to enable customers to provide feedback about my App and need an easy way to watch this feedback.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have an easy way to manage the pricing modality of my Apps.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have the API to be well defined and well documented.
#G19# As a developer, I want to obtain Apps development support.
#G19# As a developer, I want to know the fees the provider of the market place charges for using the platform.
#G19# As a developer, I want to be notified as soon as possible when the state of any of my Apps changes.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have detailed information of what happened when my App crashes on the user's device.
#G19# As a developer, I want to present my App in several ways.
#G19# As a developer, I want to be able to design my App on my own - though there will be a few rules I have to stand to.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have an easy way to define questions the user can ask and perform.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have my App to be granted access to several operating system features.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have the API components to be on a high level so that I don't have to deal with their details.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have an easy way to read data from health sensors the user is wearing.
#G19# As a serious games developer, I want to be able to take control over some functions to provide the desired user experience.
#G19# As a developer, I want to provide an easy way to manage the user Settings.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have the ALFRED API to reduce the work to achieve my goals.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have the ALFRED API to reduce the work to achieve my goals.
